sentence.Network_en: The radio said other parts of the capital also came under shellfire.
sentence.Network_cn: 广播上说首都的其他地区也遭到了炮火袭击。

sentence.Network_en: Their houses were damaged by the enemy's shellfire.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们的房屋被敌人的炮火击毁.

sentence.Network_en: Their houses were damageed by the enemy's shellfire.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们的房屋为敌人的炮火所击毁.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 炮字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 炮灰〖 cannonfodder〗 炮火〖 shellfire〗 炮击〖 cannonade;bombard〗.

entry.def: Shellfire is the firing of large military guns.

example.ex: The radio said other parts of the capital also came under shellfire.
example.tran: 广播上说首都的其他地区也遭到了炮火袭击。

auth_sentence.content: Witnesses in Idlib said they came under attack for hours, and that some of the shellfire was heavy.
auth_sentence.res_content: Witnesses in Idlib said they came under attack for hours, and that some of the shellfire was heavy.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Witnesses in Idlib said they came under attack for hours, and that some of the shellfire was heavy.
